description:
A massive pumpkin grows from a tiny vine, and a man is very happy. Parents hear from the mountain god and water god that their child will be stolen by Kappas on his twelfth birthday. A huge willow stands in front of a tea shop.  The son of the shop saves it from being cut down.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chiisana Tochi no Mi / Kappa ga Detekita Hi / Oryuu Yanagi
The Little Chestnut / The Day the Kappa Came / The Oryuu Willow
小さな栃の実 / 河童が出てきた日 / おりゅう柳
